review: My wife had gynae issue so went to hospital. Treatment was fine by doctor. They identified problem very late. The concern was they are taking payment only via cash mode and not on card payment in hospital. They told my wife has to be operated and it would charge Rs 7000 but I didn't carry so much cash that time since everywhere card is being accepted but in this hospital they are accepting only cash payment. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was less waiting time in the hospital. She is recovering and they told her to come after 3 weeks. Hospital management was not good.

She is an awesome doctor.she was like pillar of confidence throughout my pregnancy.her bold words made me to cross all hurdles I faced during pregnancy.her advice was perfect.the best doctor to consult

The Doctor behaviour is so superb treatment procedure is extra ordinary her suggestions helps my wife a very good era of her life, the secretary of the doctor are behaved every patient with their skils.
Dr was in a hurry the fee was quoted as we are there to buy something. Let us not make a money making business.
Dr. are very good behavior.I satisfy my question and answer . Dr. are very nice dicous my question & my problems
